page.title: 08A Buxton Schoolboy's Day.
page.content: 8.00.Get up and have breakfast. 8.40.Leave home for Buxton College. This is an all boys' school. 9.00.Registration Bell. You have lessons until 11.45. Then it's dinner until 12.50. Then back to work until break at 2.05. This lasts until 2.25. The end of the school day is at 3.30. Arrive home around 4.00. Get changed and go down to the Swimming Baths. I usually have dinner at 6.00 to 7.00 depending on what time my father gets in from work. After dinner I either watch T.V., or go out with my friends. I would get in from playing at 10.00. I then have a shower, do my homework, if I have any, and get my things ready for school. Around 10.45 I go to bed and read.
